links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..102
P. De Geest, Palindromic numbers beyond base 10
mathematica: palQ[n_Integer, base_Integer] := Block[{idn = IntegerDigits[n, base]}, idn == Reverse[idn]]; Select[ Range[10^7], palQ[ #, 6] && palQ[ #, 10] &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ Sep 30 2004 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
